meanings.meaning: be man enough (to do something/for something)

vlive.korean: 좀 강하다 그래야 되나? should I say that the scent is stronger? 듣기 View video 카모마일T (Chamomile_T) : 러쉬 가디스 신제품 전제품 리뷰! / LUSH Goddess review
vlive.english: should I say that the scent is stronger?

vlive.korean: 그 언니는 매우 강하다. Her sister is very strong. 듣기 View video KONGSUENI : [Kongsueni 콩슈니] 개그우먼들과 뷰티토크&즉석메이크업(꿀잼보장) Beauty Talk with Gag Woman
[원활한 의사소통으로 만족스러운 결과를 get!] 강하다 저거. [Satisfying results due to easy communication] This is strong. 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : Ep.04 오빠美 뿜뿜! 무엘이의 잉글리쉬 타임
vlive.english: [Satisfying results due to easy communication] This is strong.

vlive.korean: 멀쩡한 사람들보다 훨씬 희망적이고 또 꿈을 쫓는 어떤 활력이 강하다 그래요. are actually more hopeful than most people and more assertive to chase after their dreams. 듣기 View video KIM DONG WAN : 1010클럽with제시, 한라
vlive.english: are actually more hopeful than most people and more assertive to chase after their dreams.

vlive.korean: 역시 강하다. You are strong indeed. 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 - 비트콤 #23 (8월 일본 프로모션 비하인드 Part 3 )
